body: @Mee_nurr_vahh Chitose wasn't an open ending, you just didn't get it. Hori is done with Chitose and doesn't care about her romantically, anymore. He has Mika as a fuck buddy and Suzu as a potential lover to replace the space Chitose once occupied in his heart. Chitose? Who cares...she chose to be the Gorilla's fuck doll than be with the one she "loved". She doesn't even seem to care about Hori anymore, anyway, herself. So it doesn't matter. Again, not and open ending...you just didn't see that it's all done and life goes on. Hori merely turned the next chapter in his life as is what normally happens when love is unrequited.

In last page she said "unfortunely I don't love you anymore. I love that fat fucker of Mr. Uglyson Batard, his cock weighs six times yours and he is not a faggy cuckold! get lost, loser! I'll call you afterwards to clean my pussy".
I get why horsefucker göbbels would want to off himself but i don't get why he wants to pull the other cucks down with him
This feels like a slow burn that has more story than what it should. Could have been better, could have been worse.
WTF!!!!!!!!! THEY STILL HAVE RRELATIONSHIP AT LAST!!!?!?!?!?!?!??! ALLRIGHT JUST BREAK UP NANASE THAT WHAT THE BEST FOR YOU AND KOICHI
Just gonna assume they broke up. Better than getting annoyed.
it's like chitose's ending, open ended and just straight up bad, a lot of shit could've been done to deviate from the usual ntr to make it fresh or different, but no, usual generic formula
Better solution: just blacklist NTR
Simple solution: Just don't read the last 5 pages LOL XD
NTR lately are repetitive and the ending of this one is really boring.
What a selfish bitch, but @glad1985 brings up a valid point.
Lol, an open ending. Gotta love brainless NTR artists who rely so heavily on that lame shit.

At least the dude tried to talk things out at the end. If him not satisfying is a problem she should just tell him, even if that might hurt him, it's better than ending up as she did. And we really got cucked at the end huh.
@Mini_Diva this is with chapter 2 to & what you share is same with thia

Somehow the premise of "but he can't satisfy my body" always come of to me as the most ridiculous in ntr. Just tell him you need more attention and a big dildo up your ass, because that's what you are into. I'm sure he'll be down. I also never understand those "loving boyfriends" who just finish themselves and move on - the whole point of the game is making the girl come, a guy can finish in 3 minutes to whatever if he tries, there's nothing to it. But I guess if there were actually communicating like normal people, it wouldn't be ntr.
Damn, the author even cucked readers with that last panel.
This is actually pretty deep with the addiction and all that. The feelings conveyed are pretty realistic.
